title: font ID - tapered serifs
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141110233311im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bighunkfont_5306.jpg)

Looking to find out what the Big Hunk candy bar font is, any ideas? Interested in anything similiar (ie: Emigre fairplex, SF giants logo, Pgh pirates logo, tapered serifs in general)

thanks!
author: djdarbyd

comments.content:
because you mentioned Pirates, thought you might be interested in the fantastic work of Dennis Ortiz-Lopez.

[http://www.ortiz-lopez.com/OLP17.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20141110233311/http:/www.ortiz-lopez.com/OLP17.html "http://www.ortiz-lopez.com/OLP17.html")
